description:
From the saddle to the summit, the Trailcross LT handles hot days or when you'll be pushing or hiking your bike. The mesh fabric lets your feet breathe without sacrificing support. The Stealth Phantom outsole provides the tackiness you expect from Five Ten shoes, giving you control in the saddle and confidence on the trail.

  • Lightweight mesh upper breathes well to keep feet cool
  • Midsole cutouts allow water to drain
  • EVA midsole for added shock absorption
  • Stealth Phantom rubber outsole for unbeatable grip
  • Dotty forefoot tread and lugged heel and toe
name: Five Ten Trailcross LT Cycling Shoes - Men's
